title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Timisoara, Romania
description:
Romania was the first non-US country to host a code retreat, so we have a tradition and passion for this type of events. 
Regardless if you are a pro or a novice in programming, you are welcome to join a full day event created by coders for coders. This is a great opportunity to play, explore and learn programming from others like you.Â  
Reserve your place at the official page of the event. 
http://www.meetup.com/The-Timisoara-Agile-Software-Meetup-Group/events/145643002/
